trans-unit.source: Sets the identity of the user for an ASP.NET application when forms authentication is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Define a identidade do usuário para um aplicativo ASP.NET quando a autenticação de formulários está habilitada.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> sets the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to an <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object that represents the user identity for the current request when the authentication <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode.Forms> in the [authentication Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/27bc0ba9-f23a-45f3-ae42-dbe7916e3ee2) element of the application's configuration file.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> define atual <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade para um <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> solicitação de objeto que representa a identidade do usuário atual quando a autenticação <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A> é definido como <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode.Forms> no [autenticação Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/27bc0ba9-f23a-45f3-ae42-dbe7916e3ee2) elemento do arquivo de configuração do aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> exposes an <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event that enables you to provide a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object for the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> expõe um <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> evento que permite que você forneça um personalizado <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> de objeto para o <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> propriedade <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event is accessed by specifying a subroutine named **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> evento é acessado, especificando uma sub-rotina chamada **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** no arquivo global. asax para seu aplicativo ASP.NET.

trans-unit.source: In IIS 7.0, using the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> with the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> is not supported.
trans-unit.target: No IIS 7.0, usando o <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> com o <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> não tem suporte.

trans-unit.source: For more information about compatibility issues in Integrated modes, see [Moving an ASP.NET Application from IIS 6.0 to IIS 7.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/76f9cc78-f978-4837-b1c8-51d642ec4847).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre problemas de compatibilidade no modo integrado, consulte [mover um aplicativo ASP.NET do IIS 6.0 para o IIS 7.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/76f9cc78-f978-4837-b1c8-51d642ec4847).

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir usa o **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** evento para definir o <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> propriedade <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> para um personalizado <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule" />.

trans-unit.source: This constructor is not intended to be called from application code.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor não se destina a ser chamado no código do aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET calls this constructor to create an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> class.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET chama este construtor para criar uma instância do <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> classe.

trans-unit.source: After calling the constructor, it calls the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Init%2A> method to initialize the new <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> object.
trans-unit.target: Depois de chamar o construtor, ele chama o <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Init%2A> método para inicializar o novo <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the application authenticates the current request.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o aplicativo autentica a solicitação atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event is raised during the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> é gerado durante o <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> evento.

trans-unit.source: You can handle the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> class by specifying a subroutine named **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: Você pode manipular o <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> evento o <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> classe especificando uma sub-rotina chamada **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** no arquivo global. asax para seu aplicativo ASP.NET.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs><xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property supplied to the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs> <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> propriedade fornecida para o **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** evento para definir o <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> propriedade <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> para um personalizado <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> objeto.

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property during the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event, the identity supplied by the forms authentication ticket in the cookie or URL is used.
trans-unit.target: Se você não especificar um valor para o <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> propriedade durante o **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** evento, a identidade fornecida pelo tíquete de autenticação de formulários no cookie ou URL é usada.

trans-unit.source: The **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is only raised when the authentication mode is set to <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode.Forms> in the [authentication Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/27bc0ba9-f23a-45f3-ae42-dbe7916e3ee2) element of the application's configuration file and the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> is an active HTTP module for the application.
trans-unit.target: O **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** evento é gerado apenas quando o modo de autenticação é definido como <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode.Forms> no [autenticação Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/27bc0ba9-f23a-45f3-ae42-dbe7916e3ee2) elemento do arquivo de configuração do aplicativo e o <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> é um módulo HTTP ativado para o aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to a <xref:System.Security.Principal.GenericPrincipal> object that has a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.Identity%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo de código usa o **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** evento para definir o <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> propriedade <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> para um <xref:System.Security.Principal.GenericPrincipal> objeto que tem um personalizado <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.Identity%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources, other than memory, used by the <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule" />.
trans-unit.target: Libera todos os recursos, exceto a memória, usados pelo <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is not intended to be called from application code.
trans-unit.target: Esse método não se destina a ser chamado no código do aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The current <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpApplication" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: A instância <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpApplication" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa o objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is not intended to be called from application code.
trans-unit.target: Esse método não se destina a ser chamado no código do aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Init%2A> method ensures that the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> is included in the processing of the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> and <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.EndRequest> events.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Init%2A> método garante que o <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> está incluído no processamento das <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> e <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.EndRequest> eventos.
